attributes.name: website URLs
attributes.description: The website's address.
Technology version number, e.g. '1.0.0'.

attributes.name: traffic rank
attributes.description: Relative indicator of website traffic. Higher means more traffic.

attributes.name: On homepage
attributes.description: The technology was found on the website's homepage.

attributes.name: Verified at
attributes.description: The date the technology was last verified to be present on the website.
Technology name in machine-readable format, e.g. 'shopify'.
Technology name, e.g. 'Shopify'.
CPE name to uniquely identify the technology. Can be used to find CVEs (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures).
Category ID, slug and name, e.g. '2', 'ecommerce' and 'Ecommerce' respectively.
Technology version number, e.g. '1.0.0'.

attributes.name: traffic rank
attributes.description: Relative indicator of website traffic. Higher means more traffic.

attributes.name: confirmed at
attributes.description: Timestamp of the last recorded time the technology was identified on the website.
The website's title, as found on the homepage.
The website's meta description.
Copyright notice, if found (e.g. "Copyright Â© 2018 - 2020").

attributes.name: copyright year
attributes.description: The most recent year extracted from the copyright notice (e.g. "2020").
Website has a responsive layout, i.e. optimised for various screen sizes.

attributes.name: schema.org types
attributes.description: Types defined in the website's schema.org JSON-LD.

attributes.name: company name
attributes.description: Company name.

attributes.name: inferred company name
attributes.description: Company name, inferred from website content (best guess).
Company industry, e.g. 'Design'.
Company description.
Business locations.

attributes.name: company size
attributes.description: Number of employees at the company.

attributes.name: company type
attributes.description: The type of company, e.g. 'Public Company' or 'Privately Held'.

attributes.name: company founded
attributes.description: The year the company was founded.

attributes.name: people
attributes.description: Names and titles of people at the company.

attributes.name: phone numbers
attributes.description: Phone numbers found on the website's contact page. We identify tel: links and numbers that appear to be phone numbers.

attributes.name: email addresses
attributes.description: Email addresses found on the website's contact page. We identify mailto: links and strings that appear to be email addresses based on the website's domain.

attributes.name: verfied email addresses
attributes.description: Verified and reachable email addresses.

attributes.name: safe email addresses
attributes.description: Verified, reachable and safe-to-send email addresses.

attributes.name: Skype
attributes.description: Skype handles found on the website's contact page.

attributes.name: WhatsApp
attributes.description: WhatsApp numbers found on the website's contact page.

attributes.name: Twitter
attributes.description: Twitter handles found on the website's contact page.

attributes.name: Facebook
attributes.description: Facebook handles found on the website's contact page.

attributes.name: Instagram
attributes.description: Instagram handles found on the website's contact page.

attributes.name: GitHub
attributes.description: GitHub handles found on the website's contact page.

attributes.name: TikTok
attributes.description: TikTok handles found on the website's contact page.

attributes.name: YouTube
attributes.description: YouTube handles found on the website's contact page.

attributes.name: Pinterest
attributes.description: Pinterest handles found on the website's contact page.

attributes.name: LinkedIn
attributes.description: LinkedIn handles found on the website's contact page.

attributes.name: Owler
attributes.description: Owler handles found on the website's contact page.

attributes.name: Technology spend
attributes.description: Estimated technology spend (very low, low, medium, high or very high).

attributes.name: Country
attributes.description: The website's canonical country (best guess), derived from business locations, phone numbers, top-level domain and IP address.

attributes.name: Region
attributes.description: The website's region (e.g. state, best guess).

attributes.name: Countries
attributes.description: All countries the website was found to serve content from.
The website's canonical language, determined by interpreting content on the website. Indicative only.
All languages detected on the website.

attributes.name: Certificate organisation name
attributes.description: Organisation name of the subject on the SSL/TLS certificate.

attributes.name: Certificate country
attributes.description: Country of the subject on the SSL/TLS certificate.

attributes.name: Certificate state
attributes.description: State of the subject on the SSL/TLS certificate.

attributes.name: Certificate locality
attributes.description: Address of the subject on the SSL/TLS certificate.

attributes.name: Certificate protocol
attributes.description: SSL/TLS protocol and version.

attributes.name: Certificate expiry
attributes.description: Expiry date of the SSL/TLS certificate.

attributes.name: SSL/TLS enabled
attributes.description: The website is served over a secure connection.

attributes.name: SPF record
attributes.description: The website has an SPF record.

attributes.name: DMARC record
attributes.description: The website has a DMARC record.

attributes.name: Google Analytics
attributes.description: Google Analytics tracking ID.

attributes.name: Google AdSense
attributes.description: Google AdSense tracking ID.

attributes.name: Medianet
attributes.description: Medianet tracking ID.

attributes.name: Facebook
attributes.description: Facebook tracking ID.

attributes.name: Optimizely
attributes.description: Optimizely tracking ID.
Relevant keywords found in website content.
The first time the website was indexed.
The last time the website was indexed.
The last attempt to index the website.
